attributes.additional_details:
To start resolving our economic situation of high deficit, the government should open more profitable shopping centres, like Westfield and open a tourist attraction to portray the British history and society in one building. This would cost money to build, and allocate builders etc. nevertheless, when completed the government would earn more profit. This would resolve some of the high unemployment due to high level of available jobs and also attract tourists, they could find out all the traditions and history of our country, to symbolise why Britain is the way it is, today (positive aspect of course).

The government should agree that this a good idea due to the current economic situation of high unemployment.

It shall cost money to make however make more money when made.
